cards.rules_text:
When Timeless Heartwood enters the battlefield, search your library for a card named Heart of the Sea or a card named Soul of Fire, reveal it, shuffle, then put it on top of your library.
Tap artifacts you control named Eternity’s Horizon, Heart of the Sea, Bones of the Earth, Soul of Fire, and Timeless Heartwood: Target player loses the game.

When Scholar of Harbaz enters the battlefield, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]

Arbitrate. [i](You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.)[/i]
Draw a card.

At the beginning of your upkeep, for each judgment counter you have, choose one —
• [b]Penance [/b]— You lose 1 life.
• [b]Tithe [/b]— Target opponent creates a tapped Treasure token.

Whenever Emperor’s Hand deals combat damage to an opponent, that player gets that many judgment counters. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]

When Dakazhi Judge enters the battlefield, each player gets a judgment counter.
{1}{U}{B}, {T}: Arbitrate. [i](You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.)[/i]

When Prince’s Tutor enters the battlefield, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
Whenever another creature you control studies, put a +1/+1 counter on Prince’s Tutor.
Destroy target creature. Its controller gets a judgment counter. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]

Sculptures you control get +1/+1.
Engrave 3—{3}{U}{R} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{U}{R}, when it enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Engrave 3—{3}{B}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{B}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]
Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain haste and menace until end of turn.
Spells you cast for their engrave cost and artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

{W}{U} JUDGMENT TAPOUT Cast judgment upon your foes with strong control effects.
{U}{B} ARBITRATE Move judgment and +1/+1 counters, and justice is yours to decide.
{B}{R} SPELLSLINGER Cast noncreature spells to boost your board presence.
{R}{G} STUDY Your creatures can research new spells or grow stronger.
{G}{W} SACRIFICE Your loss is no one’s gain. Sacrifice creatures and Treasures for profit. 
{W}{B} JUDGMENT CONTROL Wait patiently to pass judgment upon the enemy.
{B}{G} +1/+1 COUNTERS  Grow your creatures through study and engraving.
{G}{U} ARTIFACTS Build monuments and engrave your legacy with artifact spells.
{U}{R} SCULPTURES The living statuary of Akaddi is yours to command.
{R}{W} HARMONY Attack with both artifact and nonartifact creatures for bonuses.
Each player exiles all nonland permanent cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all nonland permanents they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

Choose one —
• Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
• Reveal an artifact card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
Arbitrate. [i](You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.)[/i]
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
Exile target spell.
Defender
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
For each judgment counter each player has, that player sacrifices a creature.
Take an extra turn after this one. You get five judgment counters. Exile Ritual of Time.
{1}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Hungry Shadow gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

Menace
When Qamurab’s Executioner enters the battlefield, target opponent gets a judgment counter. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]
Initiate of Gurnal has deathtouch as long as an opponent has a judgment counter.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on Rebellious Dreamer if you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.
When Purveyor of Lies enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Flash
When Tormented Occultist enters the battlefield, if you cast it during your main phase, target opponent gets a judgment counter. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]
{2}{B}, Exile Pestilent Swarm from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

Menace

Menace
When Ghazuz’s Inititate enters the battlefield, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}{B}: Shadow of Remorse gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.
Sacrifice Ruthless Cobra: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

When Attentive Learner enters the battlefield, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
Isolated Idol’s power and toughness are each equal to the highest mana value among artifacts you control.

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn.
Engrave 2—{3}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute two +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Engrave 3—{3}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

When Crafter of Wonders enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

Trample
When Somber Philosopher enters the battlefield, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
Wandering Iyazta enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you’ve sacrificed a permanent this turn.
{3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
Vigilance, reach
When Wandering Wiseman enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Sculpture you control.

Engrave 2—{2}{R} [i](If you cast this spell for {2}{R}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute two +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]
Up to one creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

When Somber Stargazer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, Somber Stargazer studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
Whenever you attack with an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature, Temple Architect gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

When Devotee of Ghazuz enters the battlefield, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
When Pensive Harpist enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token. It gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Hippodrome Champion gains haste and menace until end of turn.
When Votary of the Worm enters the battlefield, you may exile a noncreature card from your graveyard. If you do, Votary of the Worm deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
{T}: The next artifact spell you cast this turn, or the next spell you cast for its engrave cost you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.

When Dour Thiefcatcher enters the battlefield, each opponent gets a judgment counter. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]

When Capricious Ibis enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on Tyrant of the Waterways.
• Scry 2.

Choose target attacking or blocking creature or target planeswalker. Its controller gets a judgment counter, then Bloodied Hands deals damage to that permanent equal to twice the number of judgment counters its controller has. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]

Until end of turn, target creature gains first strike, lifelink, indestructible, and “whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, that player gets a judgment counter”. Untap it. Target player gets a judgment counter, then you create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to the number of judgment counters that player has. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]

Whenever Outrider of Akaddi deals combat damage to an opponent, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever Devouring Ammit attacks, you may exile two target cards from a single graveyard. If you exile two cards that share a card type this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Devouring Ammit.
When Thrashing Demolisher enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature artifact, noncreature enchantment, or nonbasic land.

Engrave X—{X}{G}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {X}{G}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute X +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]
Look at a number of card from the top of your library equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Reach
Unjustly Condemned enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

When Tower of Hubris enters the battlefield, search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}, {T}: Put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that had a counter put on it this turn.

Each artifact creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Engrave 5—{8} [i](If you cast this spell for {8}, when it enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute five +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Engrave 2—{1}{G}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {1}{G}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute two +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]
Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control.
Return target permanent card or card with engrave from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, each opponent loses 1 life.
Whenever you sacrifice another permanent for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Wanderer’s Folly and you gain 2 life.

Whenever you attack with an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature, Charge into History deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

Whenever Hunter’s Chariot becomes crewed for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one creature that crewed it.

At the beginning of combat each turn, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if an opponent controls a creature with first strike or has a creature card with first strike in their graveyard. The same is true for flying, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance.

Flying, lifelink
Whenever a player shuffles, you may look at the top card of that player’s library. If you do, you may exile that card.
Baniphal, Law’s Hammer gets +1/+1 for each mana value among cards exiled with it.
Whenever a player casts a spell during a turn other than their own, that player draws a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Ghazuz, Indolent Worm and it deals damage equal to its power to that player.

Flying
Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it. That player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a card that shares a type with the countered spell. That player may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then the player shuffles. This ability triggers only once per player each turn.

Each other creature has base power and toughness 2/2.
If a land is tapped for two or more mana, it produces only one of that mana instead.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

Flying, vigilance
Divine Arbiter has lifelink as long as an opponent has three or more judgment counters.
Whenever Divine Arbiter enters the battlefield or attacks, target opponent gets a judgment counter. [i](At the beginning of their upkeep, for each judgment counter, they lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]

Whenever a player draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, or casts a spell during a turn other than their own, that player gets a judgment counter. cards.special_text:
[+1]: Destroy up to one target artifact. If its mana value was 2 or less, put a loyalty counter on Thomil, Craven Sadist.
[-X]: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
[-6]: Create a 7/7 black Demon creature token with flying and trample.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses life equal to its toughness.

Target opponent chooses instant or sorcery. Search your library for any number of cards of the chosen type with total mana value X or less, exile them, then shuffle. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage to an opponent, you gain that much life.
{T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to the amount of life you’ve gained this turn from your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

Whenever a permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, note its card types.
{1}: Until end of turn, Shaba’s Monument becomes a Sculpture artifact creature with vigilance and “Shaba’s Monument’s power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of types noted for it.”

As Living Archetype enters the battlefield, each player mills five cards. You may exile two creature cards from among cards milled this way. If you do, Living Archetype enters the battlefield enters the battlefield as a copy of one of those cards with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the other card.

At the beginning of your upkeep and whenever you cast a spell, arbitrate. [i](You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.)[/i]

{RG}, Sacrifice a creature: Add {R}{G} and put a blood counter on Temple to Ghazuz.
As long as Temple to Ghazuz has three or more blood counters on it, it’s a land with “{T}: Add {R}{G}.” [i](It’s no longer an enchantment.)[/i]

At the beginning of your precombat main phase, exile all noncreature, nonland cards from all graveyards, then choose a card at random from among cards exiled with Screaming Prophet. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

Trample
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, you may instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Sin.
Whenever Sin attacks, create two 1/1 green Incarnation creature tokens.

cards.special_text:
Crucius, the Riddle of Silver enters the battlefield with a number of loyalty counters on it equal to the number of artifacts you control.
[+1]: Create a Clue token.
[-1]: Put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact you control. It becomes a 0/0 Sculpture creature in addition to its other types.
[-X]: Search your library for a card with mana value X or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.rules_text:
Nemesis of Order enters the battlefield with seven sin counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card, you lose 1 life, and remove a sin counter from Nemesis of Order.
As long as Nemesis of Order has a sin counter on it, you can’t win the game and your opponents can’t lose the game.

Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, return up to one target permanent card with mana value less than or equal to that spell’s mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.

At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, that player reveals the top card of their library. If it’s a creature card, the player puts the card into their graveyard and Shapeshifter’s Marrow becomes a copy of that card. [i](If it does, it loses this ability.)[/i]

When Palace Sphinx enters the battlefield, each opponent gets a judgment counter.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. For each judgment counter that player has, they choose one from among flying, vigilance, prowess, or hexproof. Palace Sphinx has the chosen abilities until your next turn.

Menace
When Iyazta Stylite dies, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, return target creature card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
When Inexorable Executioner enters the battlefield, you may remove a judgment counter from an opponent. If you do, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

When Feet of Clay enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Nonbasic lands are the chosen type.

Fated Hero gets +1/+1 and has vigilance as long an opponent controls a creature with power 3 or greater.
Fated Hero gets +1/+1 and has first strike as long an opponent controls a creature with toughness 3 or greater.

Flying, haste
Incendiary Rukh gets +1/+1 for each judgment counter each opponent has.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Incendiary Rukh is in your graveyard, you may remove a judgment counter from an opponent. If you do, you may cast Incendiary Rukh from your graveyard this turn.

Edict of Mortality deal 3 damage to any target. If this spell was engraved, Edict of Mortality deals 7 damage instead.
Engrave 3—{3}{R}{R} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{R}{R}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell was engraved, instead return two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Engrave 3—{3}{G}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{G}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Reach, haste
When Lord of the Swarm dies, if it wasn’t sacrificed, create six tokens that are copies of it, except they’re 1/1.

Exile target nonland permanent. If its mana value was 3 or greater, you get a judgment counter. [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, for each judgment counter, you lose 1 life or choose an opponent to create a Treasure.)[/i]

Flying, ward {7}
Whenever Unchallenged Lawgiver deals combat damage to an opponent, double the number of each kind of counter on target permanent or that target player has.

Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If this spell was engraved, instead each creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Engrave 3—{3}{B}{B} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{B}{B}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

First strike
Whenever you attack with an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature, Monument Worshipper gains double strike until end of turn.
If a nonland source you control would produce mana, it produces that mana plus an additional {G}.
Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability that targets you or a permanent you control.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may remove a judgment counter from an opponent.
Draw two cards. If the additional cost was paid, instead draw three cards.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{B} any number of times. Copy it for each time the additional cost was paid.
Choose a nonland permanent type. Each opponent sacrifices a permanent of that type. If they can’t, they lose 2 life.
Destroy all artifacts.

Haste
Guardian Scourge enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to X or to the greatest number of counters on a permanent an opponent controls, whichever is greater.

Your life total becomes equal to half your starting life total. If this spell was engraved, instead your life total becomes equal to your starting life total.
Engrave 3—{3}{W}{W} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{W}{W}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Each opponent mills eight cards. If this spell was engraved, instead each opponent mills thirty cards.
Engrave 3—{3}{U}{U} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{U}{U}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Flying
If an effect would create one or more noncreature tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead and you lose 1 life for each token created this way.

{X}, Exile a creature card with mana value X from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of the exiled card, except it’s a Sculpture artifact creature and has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

X can’t be 0.
When Unquestioned Iyazta enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

When Enforced Humility enters the battlefield, each opponent gets a judgment counter.
Creatures can’t attack you unless their controller pays {X} for each creature they control that’s attacking you, where X is the number of judgment counters they have.

If one or more counters would be put on a permanent you don’t control, you may have that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters be put on that permanent instead.
If a player would get one or more counters, you may have that player get that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters instead.

Instant and sorcery spells you control and permanents you control have deathtouch.
Whenever a creature dies, Remorseful General deals 1 damage to each player.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control with the lowest power studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]

Destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target land. Each player who controlled a permanent destroyed this way may search their library for a permanent card that shares a type with it, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Arbitrate. [i](You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token and put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is that spell’s mana value.

Flying, vigilance
Whenever a creatures enters the battlefield, if its power is greater than Stoic Watcher’s, put a +1/+1 counter on Stoic Watcher.
Whenever a creature dies, if its toughness is greater than Stoic Watcher’s, put a +1/+1 counter on Stoic Watcher.

Haste
Whenever you attack with an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

{X}, {T}, Sacrifice Herald of the Old Ways: Search your library for a Lammasu, Manticore, Nephilim, or Sphinx card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If X is 6 or more, create a token that’s a copy of that card.

{T}: Add {C}. Put a charge counter on Ominous Obelisk.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Ominous Obelisk: Add {C} for each charge counter removed this way.

{T}: Add {C}.
{3}: Put a charge counter on Tomb of the Forgotten. Then if Tomb of the Forgotten has ten or more charge counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create ten 2/2 black Horror creature tokens.

As Qamesh, Ardent Justicar enters the battlefield, choose law or order.
• Law — Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
• Order — Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
When you cast your next spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]

Whenever Decadent Barge enters the battlefield or attacks, exile the top two cards of each opponent’s library.
Decadent Barge’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards exiled with it.

Graven Ideal deals X damage to any target.
Engrave X—{X}{X}{R} [i](If you cast this spell for {X}{X}{R}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute X +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever Stoic Stylite deals combat damage to an opponent, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
When Proud Contender dies, exile it. If you do, create a white enchantment token named Proud Memories with “Creatures you control get +1/+1.”

Flying
When Anointed Scarab dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, return each other creature with mana value X or less to its owner’s hand.
Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of permanents put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn.

Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Barkhan Hellkite gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, search your library for a permanent card with the same mana cost as that card plus an additional {1}, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [i](Mana cost includes color. For example, if you sacrifice a permanent with mana cost {2}{W}{B}, search for a permanent with mana cost {3}{W}{B}.)[/i]

Engrave 3—{5}{G}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {5}{G}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)[/i]
Double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
